Name: Moonlaw
About the game: Moonlaw is a mini-micro-metroidvania about a heroic knight's adventure to destroy a horrible monster on the moon! Years ago, the moon was infected with a fleshy disease. Knights of the Earth Military tried to defeat the monster, yet all was lost. Until one day, a hero stared at the sky above... and swore to become the law of the moon, and defeat the blight! In Moonlaw you will... Explore and fight through the grottos and ghouls of the moon's cavernous depths. Collect various upgrades to unlock cool new movement abilities and powers. Enjoy an atmospheric romp through varied locations. Fight dangerous bosses! Challenge yourself to collect all items for a special ending!
Meta Title: Moonlaw: Dec 20, 2021, Scumhead and Full Overview
